body.p: Some argue that less frequent measurement of fair value should be permitted because of concerns about burdens on entities. The Board rejected this approach because of the:

li.p: lack of direct relationships between financial transactions and the outcomes of biological transformation; and
general availability of reliable measures of fair value at reasonable cost.
